datafield.subfield: LHCb masterclass event files for the event display
Each file contains 30 events recorded with LHCb detector. The events have been pre-selected using loose criteria to contain D0 meson candidates decaying into a Kaon and a Pion.
It can be visualised with the LHCb event display using LHCb VM image
LHCb Masterclass D0lifetime 2014 event files file index
LHCb event file for real measurement
This file contains about 60k events pre-selected using loose criteria to contain D0 meson candidates decaying into a Kaon and a Pion.
The file can be accessed and analysed using LHCb D0 lifetime measurement code using LHCb VM image
LHCb Masterclass D0lifetime 2014 real measurement file index
